title: Shattered Souls
description: The final installment of the Witch Avenue Series. A battle is brewing among the covensâ€¦ As Triss prepares to defeat the Praedivinus, a new order rises, and this one is far more deadly. Navigating her way through mystic realms, and unknown portals it is up to Triss to recognize real from imagined and stop the two from colliding.
author: Karice Bolton
